title: RHOBH Crystal Clear + Matt Rogers (Fire Island)
itunes:title: RHOBH Crystal Clear + Matt Rogers (Fire Island)
description:
Danny recaps The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which featured a trip to Mexico, more untangling of the Sutton/Crystal situation, Farrah's engagement, and more! The second episode of Real Housewives of Dubai also aired, and Danny has thoughts. After the Bravo talk, Matt Rogers of Hulu's Fire Island and Showtime's I Love That For You stops by to talk MORE Housewives, plus his work, the Bechdel test, why Anna Faris deserves and Oscar, and more!


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
